main event: A civilian couple reported seeing a brilliant blue cigar-shaped object about 2/3 the width of the moon, approximately 18 miles north of Roanoke, Texas on October 26, 1952.
interesting points: The object was identified as cigar-shaped and brilliant blue,The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes,The object was observed 2 miles south of Roanoke on US Highway 77,Two women and one man were the confirmed witnesses to the event,No additional records were found after checking with local flight services.
witness description: Civilian couple driving in their car
